about_the_game:
The game is a free add-on for the base game.

About game
A mini-game where the goal is to reach the destination.

How to play
You can select this game when you push "PLAY" on STEAM app.

Controls
Move: W, A, S, D
Jump: Spacebar
You can jump 5 times

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes the expression of firing weapons and firearms at people.
It does not include blood or Gore representations.

name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd - Family Doctor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT, Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

short_description: This mini game is a free add-on for the base game.
